sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>A stun pulse attachment deals an electric shock to the target, in addition to its weapon's normal damage. Generally attached to truncheons or bludgeoning weapons, stun pulses are often used by law enforcement to disable suspects without killing them. A stun pulse can be attached to any bludgeoning Melee or Brawl weapon. Models Include: CoroTech EV45 Pulse Coil, SoroSuub "Enforcer'' Stunner. Base Modifiers: The weapon gains the Stun 2 quality. Modification Options: 5 Item Quality (Stun + 1) Mods.</description> <encumbrance/> <hard_points/> <hp_required>1</hp_required> <name>Stun Pulse</name> <number>GEAR0001177</number> <price>250</price> <range/> <rarity>4</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-19 05:50:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7e4b844e2fe42c90e0f497eef699b686</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-19 05:50:00</sys_updated_on> <type>mod</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
